webDev.title: Salesforce BtoC Developer Training - ISDI
webDev.cardDetailedText: 3-month intensive training focused on concrete e-commerce web projects. Internship within a team of 2 developers and 1 project manager. My mission was to work on the creation of 3 internal tools to facilitate or automate team tasks: creation of a backoffice with a user authentication system to view folders to be processed, creation of a backoffice to automate landing page creation, creation of a backoffice to automate offer creation/update, creation of a backoffice to associate an offer with an ongoing landing page, integration of landing pages in Tailwind CSS, creation of a helper to facilitate form customization.
webDev.cardSubtitle: HTML5 CSS3 Javascript SQL NODE JS NO SQL Boostrap Tailwind CSS React JS Express SFRA Business Manager
webDev.cardTitle: Salesforce BtoC Commerce Developer Certificate - September 2023 - December 2023

webDev.title: Web Developer Apprenticeship Training - 3W Academy
webDev.cardDetailedText: 1-year apprenticeship training with a 3 weeks in the company / 1 week in school format. Internship within a team of 2 developers and 1 project manager. My mission was to work on the creation of 3 internal tools to facilitate or automate team tasks: creation of a backoffice with a user authentication system to view folders to be processed, creation of a backoffice to automate landing page creation, creation of a backoffice to automate offer creation/update, creation of a backoffice to associate an offer with an ongoing landing page, integration of landing pages in Tailwind CSS, creation of a helper to facilitate form customization.
webDev.cardSubtitle: HTML5 CSS3 Javascript SQL NODE JS NO SQL Boostrap Tailwind CSS Alpine JS eact JS Express CodeIgniter
webDev.cardTitle: Web Integration Techniques Certificate - Web Development Techniques Certificate - December 2021 - December 2022

webDev.title: Women In Digital Training - Social Builder and Web Force 3
webDev.cardDetailedText: 6-month training (4 months of technical training and 2 months of internship) including 490 hours of technical training. After the training, I had the opportunity to do a 2-month internship in Symfony: Optimization and addition of features to an existing site Championnat-Perplexus. Site based on SÃ©bastien Castro's open-source project GogoCarto Symfony with Sonata Bundle and using MongoDB database. Internship carried out with the company Kidz And Family.

webDev.cardTitle: Web Integration Techniques Certificate - Web Development Techniques Certificate - March 2021 - September 2021

Management of relations with other departments of the company: regulatory service, IT service, production service, marketing service, accounting service

avantReconversion.title: Development Officer
cardDetailedText: Management and loyalty of the customer base (management of a portfolio of 650 clients)
Management of schedules, collection tour planning, and warehouse management (5 collection trucks and management of a team of 13 collectors)
